DEMO_829_MSG_010: ̂Nnngh... H-Huh? It's you, ȁ... but, who is... she?
DEMO_829_MSG_020: ̂Hmph... are you kidding me right now? There's no way you've forgotten me!
DEMO_829_MSG_030:
̂No, it's coming back to me now... you're Lucia's
assistant... I think... your name was Aroma Gebslin.
DEMO_829_MSG_032: ̂What the heck! Do not use my full name!
DEMO_829_MSG_034:
̂My apologies... however, I absolutely must ask that you
only refer to me by my first name.
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_036:
̂Anyhow, yes... I'm Aroma. The absolute best assistant
that Dr. Lucia ever had.
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_040:
̂And I'm... how shall I say this... kinda also the
leader of the Resistance in Lucia's absence.
DEMO_829_MSG_050:
̂I see... then this means that the Lucia I was helping
was in fact... just another clone?
DEMO_829_MSG_060:
̂Unfortunately... it's a little more complicated than that.
I was, more or less... borrowing her identity.
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_070:
̂What's important, though... is that we were able to rescue you from Mother's Core. How are you feeling?
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_080:
̂I wasn't expecting that last fiasco to happen. I'm just
hoping that didn't put too much strain on your body.
DEMO_829_MSG_090:
̂I... feel completely fine, actually. Nothing is even remotely wrong with me at the moment.
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_100: ̂Thank you... Aroma and ȁ. I never thought there would ever be a way out of there for me...
DEMO_829_MSG_110:
̂Well, I must admit... there's a little bit more to my plan
than I originally let on.
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_120:
̂You see... you aren't the only one we've saved. Actually, you're about to find out exactly what I mean by that!
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_130:
̂With Mother finally back to normal... it's about time 
for everyone else to finally wake up.
DEMO_829_MSG_140:
̂During the migration process, a vast majority of us were
cryogenically frozen by Mother.
DEMO_829_MSG_150:
̂I feel bad for the long wait... but the plan has finally
succeeded, and everything is back under control!
DEMO_829_MSG_160:
̂But, enough of my ramblings! We've got a lot of work
ahead of us if we intend to rebuild everything, right?
ā
DEMO_829_MSG_170: ̂I'm still going to need your help! I hope that's alright with you, Lenate and ȁ!
